reviews.comments: Excelente ubicación. Muy comodo
Bien ubicado y lindo departamento, indicaciones solo en inglés...
Excelente ubicacion. Zona muy tranquila. Muy buen departamento. Flor es muy amable y atenta.
El depto es tal cual lo publicado. Muy cómodo y completo. Muchas gracias por todo Flor!
El Dpto está muybien ubicado, en una zona tranquila y muy linda para pasear. Además es súper cómodo y el jardín está muy bien cuidado!!
Excelente ubicación, anfitriones muy cordiales, todo lo necesario para pasar una excelente estadía, muy recomendable!
Buen bueno todo. Hermoso departamento. Excelente atención. Hasta la próxima.

Cómodo dpto, zona bien ubicada. 
Flor muy atenta a los requerimientos.

Todo más que en orden, excelente ubicación. Nos sentimos sumamente cómodos en el departamento, es tal cual se muestra en las fotos. La comunicación con los anfitriones fue muy buena, siempre estuvieron al pendiente. Muy lindo lugar.
Es un departamento muy acogedor, cómodo y completo. Esta ubicado en una excelente zona
Es la segunda vez que nos hospedamos en el departamento. El departamento es excelente y el anfitrión siempre nos facilitó todo lo que necesitábamos. Muy recomendable.

El  departamento es excelente, es tal cual se ve en las fotos e incluso mejor. Florencia siempre tuvo muy buena predisposición por cualquier cosa que necesitáramos y nos facilito mucho la entrega de la llave.
Es muy recomendable. Seguramente volvamos a a ir.

Estuvimos en depto studio muy bien puesto, super limpio y muy agradable la decoración. Flor nos recibió excelente y siempre estuvo a disposicion. El barrio tranquilo y con muchas cosas para ver y hacer.

Un departamento acogedor en un barrio tranquilo, basta con recorrer un par de cuadras para encontrar un lindo cafe, bar, restaurante o simplemente disfrutar una copa de vino en la terraza.

Lo recomiendo!

Es un agradable estudio. Pequeño pero acogedor. Muy bien ubicado. 
Los anfitriones muy amables y serviciales. 
Comunicación 10. 
Repetiré seguro. Muchas gracias !

Como em Las fotos. Muy Bueno, acerca de todo que vais necessitar en Palermo. Cocina bien equipada ( senti falta de un micro ondas - micro Wave). Buena ducha. Bueno aquecedor. Ótima comunicacion. Li recomendo.
Nico y Flor fueron muy pura vida con nosotros! Muchas gracias por todo chicos!
Maravillosa! Nico y Flor son muy amables y el apartamento era muy limpio.
Lo departamento es lindo acogedor y agradable. Flor es muy atenciosa. Palermo es hermoso. Nos encantó. Ganas de volver !
Fue mi primera visita en BsAs, me encantó el apartamento, los detalles de la decoración y su céntrica ubicación. 100% recomendable!

El apartamento de Flor es ideal para quien viaja solo o en pareja. Es acogedor, limpio y seguro. Está ubicado en una zona desde donde se puede hacer mucho caminando y cercano a estaciones de autobús y metro (subte).
Flor mantuvo buena comunicación con nosotros desde el momento en que solicitamos la reserva y nos dejó buenas recomendaciones de bares y restaurantes. También fue flexible con nuestros horarios de llegada y salida.

El apartamento es bonito y esta situado en una excelente zona. Palermo es muy turístico y hay muchos bares y restaurantes cerca. El apartamento es pequeño pero cómodo. No tuvimos ningún problema con comunicarnos con Nico quien nos ayudó con lo que ocupamos. 100% recomendado.

Nicolás tuvo una muy buena disposición para recibirnos y comunicarnos que el aire acondicionado se había averiado por un corte de luz grande en Buenos Aires. Lamentablemente por eso, tuvimos que irnos a un hotel ya que era un día muy caluroso en la ciudad. Él nos dio la opción de devolvernos el dinero e irnos a otro alojamiento. Sabemos que era un problema que no estaba en sus manos, nos devolvió el dinero y no tuvimos problema en ese sentido. De todas formas debieron comunicarnos un poco antes para organizarnos.

Muy bien ubicado, para ir caminando a varios buenos restaurantes del sector. El barrio es muy bonito y tranquilo; hay un sinnúmero de opciones para comprar o contar con los servicios que se necesitan cuando uno está de viaje.
El estudio es muy lindo y cómodo, tal como se puede apreciar en las fotos publicadas.
Lo recomiendo, totalmente.
La estadía fue genial, tiene muy buena ubicación y todas las comodidades. La verdad que es un lugar para volver, especialmente por la relación precio/comodidad. Todo perfecto!
Excelente todo, muy bien ubicado y el departamento súper cómodo. Recomendable!

Súper cómodo y confortable en una zona perfecta y tranquila con buena locomoción. A cuadras de la mejor oferta gastronómica y circuito de tiendas de diseño. Flor y Nico siempre pendientes y contestan enseguida. Volveré pronto!
Perfecto !!!

Flor y Nico son unos genios! Durante todo momento la comunicación fue espectacular y fluyó perfectamente. El departamento es precioso, muy bien decorado y limpio. El barrio el mejor de Buenos Aires. Tienen varios lugares para desayunar a 1 cuadra de distancia y un mini market también. Con seguridad volveremos.
Increíble ubicación, gran departamento, el anfitrión muy bueno, todo perfecto
Los anfitriones estuvieron preocupados en cada momento que lo necesite, el barrio era muy lindo, cercano a todo y muy tranquilo.

El lugar es super centrico, lindo y acogedor! El departamento tiene todas las comodidades necesarias para una visita a Buenos Aires, además de estar en una zona bastante artística y llena de restaurantes, ferias y lugares para divertirse.
Everything was as I expected :) Thanks Nico and Flor!
Flor's place is amazing; she & her husband were also very accommodating. They also gave some great tips! Would definitely recommend this stylish flat.

Excellent apartment in perfect and safe area, only steps away from great shops restaurants etc. 

Very responsive host.

Flor’s place is situated on a very quiet yet central street in Palermo. We came here after hiking in Patagonia and found exactly what we needed: a clean and hospitable place, with good wifi and a nice bed. Nico greeted us at the door and check in/out was super simple. We didn’t try the swimmingpool because we were too busy enjoying the neighbourhood. Great value for this place!
Great place in a great location!

Cet appartement est très bien situé, dans un quartier à la fois dynamique et chaleureux, avec plusieurs commerces aux alentours. Il y a un petit équipement de base pour cuisiner, mais pas de four à micro-ondes. Nous avons bien aimé la petite terrasse et la piscine dans la cour arrière.
Great apartment in a prime location. Safe and close to all amenities. Wonderful hosts .

L'appartement est très bien situé, à proximité de très bons restaurants et de toutes commodités (laverie, supermarché, pharmacie). La déco est épurée et plaisante, fidèle aux photos de l'annonce. Nous n'avons pas eu l'opportunité de rencontrer Flor mais elle s'est montrée très disponible pour répondre à nos questions et partager de bons conseils. Merci!

We had a great (EMAIL HIDDEN)munication was very easy all the time. The flat is clean, bright and nicely decorated. The area is calm and close to vivid streets full of restaurants, bars. I highly recommend it !

This nice little apartment is located in a quiet area in Palermo but bars and restaurants are just some foot steps away. The place is clean and comfortable. I definitely recommend Flor's place! You will enjoy it ❤️
We always got an answer to our msgs very soon and appreciated the flexible checkin time a lot.
Small but perfectly located apartment. Very clean and a helpful owner.

We had a great stay at Flor's place! It's a fantastic value for a clean and convenient home in a great Buenos Aires neighborhood. Flor was a very accommodating host - granting us both early check in and late check out during our stay. It was a bit cozy for two people, but this was no problem for us since we spent most of our time exploring the city.
This studio was just perfect, great location, very clean, and unbelievable hosts. Would recommend to anyone wanting to stay in one of BAs best areas.
Apartment was exactly like on the photos, great location. Checking in was very quick and in general Flor was very fast with all the responses. Very good experience! Thank you.
Thank you for a comfortable home away from home. The location was perfect. The studio was exactly like the picture and the balcony was great for having morning coffee
Great appartement in the awesome Palermo area. Nico was really helpfull with letting us in en giving some advice.
xx
The place is very clean and in a great neighbourhood; safe and in a place with Nice restaurants and bars. Nico, flors husband, welcomed us and really helped us.

Flor's place is AMAZING! The perfect location. Flor and her husband, Nico, were really helpful when it came to using the maps, informing us about the subway/transportation system, and suggesting good places to eat. Definitely a great value and exceptional experience in Buenos Aires. Thank you!!
Great value for money for this apartment in Palermo in BA.

Thank you so much for your hospitality. We loved the area. 

Room was smaller than we saw in photos but was still fantastic for the price. It was in a nice quiet area which was close to everywhere. 

We only had one toilet roll for two people for four days though.

. Room was very clean and Alejandro was very friendly. Last fault was the iron burnt my clothes on the lowest setting and left white  streak marks too. 

I would definitely rent again though

O apartamento é ótimo e aconchegante, além de bem localizado - perto de mercadinhos, bares e restaurantes. Na chegada, Nico e Flor foram receptivos e deram algumas dicas de "sobrevivência" nas redondezas! Apesar de perto do agito de bares e restaurantes, a rua e a região me pareceram tranquilas e ótimas para se hospedar.

The Host:  Flor has excellent communication skills.  She promptly replied to each of my messages.  She was very flexible with our arrival and departure times.  A true pleasure to communicate with her!

The Space:  Impeccable design.  Ideal location.  Walking distance to the best Palermo Soho has to offer and other cool spots.  Despite its proximity to a busy "barrio" in BA, it's on a beautiful tree-lined street that was very peaceful.  The ideal combination!

I highly recommend Flor and her studio!
The place is great and so is the hostess! Recommend!

We loved our time at Flor's place. Unfortunately, we only had 24 hours there instead of the expected 48 because of a flight overbooking. The apartment's central location means it's within walking distance of several great shops and restaurants. Very clean and tidy too.

Because it's central, it can be a bit noisey at night-time so light sleepers might find it hard but we weren't kept up.
Great place and neighborhood
Lovely flat in great location. Walking distance to great restaurants in Palermo. Easy check in and great communication.

Excelente estadia! Passamos momentos muito aconchegantes na residência em Palermo. Localização perfeita, perto de tudo (lazer, transporte, comércio). Os anfitriões foram super atenciosos e prestativos, sem falar que a cidade é INCRÍVEL! Buenos Aires é inexplicavelmente cosmopolita e acolhedora. Foi uma experiência indescritível e não vemos a hora de repetir. Forte abraço!
The studio is lovely and the location is very convenient. I was hosted by Nico and he was very nice and helpful.
A localização é ótima pra curtir o que Buenos Aires tem de mais lindo! O estúdio é muito gracioso e tem uma energia incrível!

Boa privacidade no prédio (quase não vi os vizinhos), apartamento bem localizado, perto de uma pracinha bem legal com igreja e vários restaurantes; dá para andar a pé por todo lado pois há bares, restaurantes e supermercado a poucas quadras, além de ônibus na esquina; o casal anfitrião é bem educado e responde rápido às dúvidas além de dar várias dicas de restaurantes; apenas 2 detalhes problemáticos: o aquecedor à gás deu problemas durante nossa estadia e o apartamento merece uma pintura nova nas paredes e piso.

Apartamento com boa localização, perto de mercados, metrô e dos bosques de Palermo. 
Sentimos falta de alguns utensílios de cozinha, mas é um bom apartamento!
Had a really great stay at Flor's apartment. Perfect location in Palermo close to a lot of good restaurants and the apartment was exactly as we'd hoped - clean, comfortable and well-equipped.

O apartamento da Flor é maravilhoso. Do jeitinho que está nas fotos. Muito aconchegante e o bairro (Palermo Soho) é o melhor, ficamos apaixonados pelo local, muito tranquilo e tudo por perto. 
Adoramos!!
Lovely flat, was exactly what we needed in that was close to restaurants and shops, easy to find and was a walkable distance from the subtle. Would definitely stay again
Best airbnb I stayed in while staying in BA/Palermo.

The apartment location was perfect: centrally located to see many different parts of the city!  The area was very safe; my boyfriend and I walk everywhere (Palermo, Villa Crespo, Recoleta, Monserrat) and we went running one morning around Lago El Rosedal.  The apartment itself is exactly like the pictures.  The studio was very clean, the shower was nice and strong, the bed was comfortable, and the little balcony was perfect for a morning coffee.

Thank you Flor and Nico for being helpful hosts who addressed all my questions and needs. I met Nico when I arrived and he was respectful and pleasant. The couple gave me space and let me enjoy my time in BA at my own pace, but they were only a text  message away. I liked the convenient location of the apartment; it made the city very navigable whether I was walking or taking the Subte (Metro). Would recommend for couples or single travelers. Thanks for having me. Ciao

The apartment looks very nice in the pictures, in reality it does have some nice design features and a very pleasant terrace. But the apartment is very small, there is no comfortable place to sit. 
The main issue was the bathroom it is tiny, the shower curtain was smelly and the bathroom mat was filthy.
We had problems communicating with Flor but her husband Nico was very nice and responding.

This apartment was a great home base  in what we found to be the best neighbourhood in Buenos Aires!! Super convenient to the subway and TONS of food and entertainment within walkin distance ! Would definitely recommend this space for your time in B.A.

Flor and Nico were fantastic hosts and just really great people. Communication was terrific from the point of booking all of the way through meeting them to start my trip in Buenos Aires. Their place was exactly as shown in the pictures, uber clean, modern furniture and a great little patio to watch the people walk by. The location is the best in the City with tons of amazing restaurants, bars and speakeasies all within walking distance. Book it!
Studio confortable, calme et excellent service de Flor. Y retournerais sans hésiter. Quartier parfait!

A great base to enjoy all that palermo has to offer. The studio is small but more than sufficient for a short trip. The balcony is a great spot to have breakfast! Flor and her husband were very helpful - going above and beyond to provide advice and recommendations.
Nice apartment, good communication with hosts.
Picture perfect location near everything in B.A., and nice cozy studio.  Great communication; Flor arranged for a driver back to the airport.

Flor and Nico were super accommodating. We arrived quite late at night and were quite sporadic with being in touch but were welcomed warmly late at night. The location of the apartment is perfect and the balcony is amazing. Great vibe for an apartment and Flor was kind enough to grant us late check out on Christmas Day. Recommend this apartment and would stay again and again. Thanks for a great stay Flor and Nico!

Flor was very easy to communicate with, and was very flexible and kind in accommodating to our travel schedule. The studio is very comfortable and clean. We found the neighborhood to be quiet and a close walk to all the great shops and restaurants in Palermo. As other reviewers have noted, the only issue is the hand shower, which flies off when one increases the water pressure. But overall, we find that the studio offers great value and is a great place to stay while discovering Buenos Aires.

Cute little studio apartment in a good location for exploring Palermo. The pillows were comfortable and the space was clean and nice. The shower was small and difficult as the pressure caused the shower head to fly off the handle frequently and the curtain did not stay closed. There is a fair amount of city noise outside but there is a pleasant view from the balcony. Hosts were friendly and easy to communicate with in English.

Everything was ok nothing exceptional, bathroom could be more clear, black carpet in the bathroom doesnt seem like they change it for every guest, this idea disgust me a lot, nice location, host is a nice guy.

Great stay and great neighbourhood! 
We would definitely come again!

My boyfriend and I stayed here for or first trip to Buenos Aires. The apartment was just as advertised; clean, comfortable, modern and private. The location was ideal as we were were able to walk everywhere within Palermo, and taxis/bus stops were always a block or two away. We would absolutely stay here again in the future and highly recommend!! Nico provided us with helpful tips, maps, and suggestions and remained communicative if needed.

This apartment is adorable! If you're looking for a very unique and special experience in Palermo, stay at Flor's cute chic apartment. It is cozy and located on one of the coolest blocks in this neighborhood. And Flor and her husband were great host. She was very helpful and communicative during the checkin/checkout process. We would definitely recommend staying here to anyone!"
Great value and terrific hosts!
Great location on a quiet street. Very easy to walk to nice cafes and restaurants. We would definitely stay here again. No question!
A localização é realmente boa! Para viver o dia-a-dia da cidade é o local ideal.

The place is wonderful! Would totally go back. Its perfect for a solo traveler or a couple. I went by myself and enjoyed it so much. Has everything you need, its both comfy and the decoration is really nice. 

Location wise, it's close to many things although at night I wouldn't go walking alone around the area. They provided a little map for me that indicated where to find key places which i thought was a nice touch.

Flor and her husband seem to have put a lot of effort into thinking in all details for you to feel welcomed.

A perfectly located home base for exploring the city. In a trendy neighbourhood, close by many restaurants and shopping, while still on a quiet and residential street. We enjoyed Casa Coupage to celebrate our honeymoon, just around the corner from the apartment. Drank coffee on the lovely balcony each morning. Thank you!

We had a great time in Flors' Appartement. Everything was perfect. Palermo is very Beautiful!
We will come back!
Nous avons été tres bien accueillis et nous avons eu tous les renseignements que nous avons demandés
Great location in Palermo. Quiet street. We were able to check in early and check out late which was great. Flor was quick to respond to emails. Apartment was clean and as described on the website.

Our stay at the white studio was great. The appartment was exactly as described on the picture. Location was perfect too with loads of nice shops, restaurants and bars in the area. Wifi was quite fast and Flor gave us quite some flexibility on our departure time.
Nice place, great atmosphere.

Great stay...everything ran smoothly, hosts helpful and communicative. Area felt very safe and friendly. Apartment stylishly decorated but small...better for one person than 2, we thought. Otherwise all good.

Flor and Nico were great hosts and made our first trip to BA really easy. The apartment is in a great location and check in was easy - even without having a cell phone. Nico gave us a map and told us about the area - even gave us a subway card to recharge. He also made us a taxi reservation for our 5am flight which we weren't sure how to do. We would definitely stay here again.

Localização excelente, próximo à tudo: bares, cafés e padarias. Conseguimos fazer tudo caminhando e de metrô, com 2 estações próximas. 
Anfitriões atenciosos e prestativos, sempre dispostos a ajudar.
Ótima experiência

Great communication with hosts! Nice location on a quiet street and a quick stroll to all the eateries and shops. The apartment and amenities are more modern and new compared to other airbnbs I've stayed at in Buenos Aires.  Very comfy stay!
Os anfitriões foram gentis e sempre solícitos. Uma excelente experiência em uma cidade maravilhosa! Voltaremos muitas vezes.
